author: abstractalgorithms
message:
feat: Enhance PostContent component with dynamic sections and key takeaways extraction

- Added parsing logic for content sections in PostContent component.
- Implemented extraction of key takeaways with icons.
- Improved rendering of related posts with navigation links.
- Updated PostContentWrapper to handle dynamic MDX content and fallback to static content.
- Refactored PostHeader to include breadcrumb navigation and improved metadata display.
- Redesigned RelatedPosts component for better layout and category representation.
- Introduced navigationCategories utility for dynamic category fetching.
- Removed outdated posts from the repository.
